metadata.title: CVE-2021-46900 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Sympa before 6.2.62 relies on a cookie parameter for certain securityobjectives, but does not ensure that this parameter exists and has anunpredictable value. Specifically, the cookie parameter is both a salt forstored passwords and an XSS protection mechanism.

criterions.comment: sympa package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
